sections.heading: medical service, defined.Emergency medical service means the organization responding to a perceived individual need for medical care in order to prevent loss of life or aggravation of physiological or psychological illness or injury

71-8215.Emergency medical service, defined.

Emergency medical service means the organization responding to a perceived individual need for medical care in order to prevent loss of life or aggravation of physiological or psychological illness or injury.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, ยง 15;Laws 2012, LB646, ยง 3.
